```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstanarm)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
c_stats<- read_csv("data/C_stats.csv")|>
  filter(MIN >=20)|>
  arrange((`FT%`))
fit_obj_c <- stan_glm(data = c_stats,
                    formula = `FT%` ~ 1,
                    family = gaussian,
                    refresh = 0,
                    seed = 9)
fit_obj_c
```
